scriptmanager.scripts.Figure_Generation

Class FourColorPlot

  • java.lang.Object
    • scriptmanager.scripts.Figure_Generation.FourColorPlot

  • public class FourColorPlot
extends java.lang.Object
    The script class to generate a four-color sequence plot to be saved as a PNG.
    Author:
    William KM Lai
    See Also:
    FourColorSequenceCLI, FourColorSequenceWindow

      • generatePLOT

        public static void generatePLOT(java.io.File input,
                                java.io.File output,
                                java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.Color> COLOR,
                                int h,
                                int w)
                         throws java.io.IOException
        Visualize sequences as color pixels
        Parameters:
        input - the FASTA to make the four color plot from
        output - the filepath to write the four-color PNG to
        COLOR - the list of colors to use for each ATCGN encoding
        h - height of each base, in pixel
        w - width of each base, in pixel
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
